column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////We ordered a small. The menu says it serves 2
column2: but there were 4 slices which was enough for us. My friends loved the butter crust and I liked the sausage. But by the time the pizza arrived
column3: I was already stuffed! I ate less than half a slice. I know
column4: I know. I should've saved more room for it to get the full experience
